content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your interest, Mr. Rahman. I'm sure you will find the apartment to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. Let's discuss the rental price. How much were you thinking of paying?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Mister Heine, I'm a student, so I'm looking for a price that's fair and within my budget. The apartment is quite small, at 25 square meters, so I believe a reasonable price would be around 600 Euro per month. Is this something we can agree on?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I understand that you're a student and need a price that fits your budget. For a small apartment like this, 600 Euro per month is a fair offer. I'm willing to accept this price.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Wonderful news, Mister Heine! I'm very pleased to hear that we can agree on 600 Euro per month. This will be a very manageable cost for me as a student. I appreciate your willingness to work with me on the price. Is there anything else we need to discuss before we finalize the agreement?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: No, Mr. Rahman, I believe we have covered everything. Thank you for your time and for choosing my apartment. I'm sure you'll be very happy here. Once you're ready, we can sign the lease and get everything official. If you have any questions or need help with anything regarding the apartment, please let me know.
name: Heinrich Heine
